name: Oh no... I'm Late!
description:
You wake up on a beautiful morning, with high hopes to start your day. Except... YOU ARE LATE!! Go running through the streets and dodging the obstacles and try to arrive on time. Do not forget to use your special skills to make it easier!

"Oh no... I'm Late" is an infinite runner, where your goal can never be achieved. You have to run as far as you can before the time runs out, collecting more time, dodging cars, boxes. It has simple mobile  controls, that consists in swipes and pressing buttons. 

This game was developed  with Ana Júlia Teles de Lima e Silva, and managed by me.
